dcterms:creator: Mark A Finlayson
dcterms:description: The ProppLearner corpus contains 15 Russian folktales annotated with verbs corresponding to Proppian functions, which are salient events in the narratives. It is used to detect sentences that contain such verbs.
dcterms:title: ProppLearner corpus

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh
Nathanael Chambers
Xiaodong He
Devi Parikh
Dhruv Batra
Lucy Vanderwende
Pushmeet Kohli
James Allen
dcterms:description: ROCStories is a dataset designed to capture a rich set of causal and temporal common sense relations among daily events, consisting of stories that each contain five sentences.
dcterms:title: ROCStories
